FuncDef: This command enables the use of the Shared Risk Loss Group (SRLG) constraint in the computation of FRR bypass or detour to be associated with any primary LSP path on this system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the SRLG group within a virtual router instance. Values-no slr-frr (default)
srlg-frr (non-strict)
srlg-frr strict (strict).
